title: New: Skarlett – Asleep
body:
Tipped off on Sydney’s **Skarlett** by fellow Aussie teenager, [Lupa J](https://soundcloud.

com/lupajmusic), reposting _Asleep_ on her Soundcloud. An almost entirely instrumental affair, it’s a slow burning, pensive number, closer to [MORLY’s](https://soundcloud.com/morlymusic) production than Lupa J’s in truth. Check out Asleep below.

excerpt.full: Tipped off on Sydney’s Skarlett by fellow Aussie teenager, Lupa J, reposting Asleep on her Soundcloud. An almost entirely instrumental affair, it’s a slow burning, pensive number, closer to MORLY’s production than Lupa J’s in truth. Check out Asleep below.
